Class Request

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.network.Request

public class Request
extends java.util.Observable

This class represents a Request. It can be observed by one or more Observers. TODO add setRequestData (for url data, etc)
